response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. With its unique features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. Given its immense value and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $15,000 to you. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This special offer is available only for a limited time, so don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
